title: Can we use custom skins?

embed.description: Leaguecraft.com - League of Legends Guides, Talent Builder and Information

body: just out of interest, dont want my account to be blocked

replies.body: We don't support any third party programs or mods, so using it is at your own risk.  In general, we can't really support any technical issues that come up as a result of using it or any hidden content that might be malicious.  Our stance on this can be found at our [Third Party Program guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848).  Hope that helps clear things up!
